DOC.brief_summary: Indications oocyte ( egg ) vitrification ( fast freezing ) include preservation reproductive competence young cancer patient need chemotherapy , pelvic radiation , surgical removal ovary treatment . Furthermore , ability freeze oocytes allow patient reduce number embryo frozen , thereby circumvent moral ethical dilemma left-over embryos cryostorage . In addition , oocyte cryopreservation could allow woman delay childbearing want need . Until recently , conventional cryopreservation protocol remain inefficient practical application infertility center . Very little known effect vitrification oocytes subsequent embryo development , especially use sibling model ( group oocytes cohort ovarian follicle within patient ) . The purpose study examine effect oocyte vitrification fertilization rate , embryo quality development .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Oocyte Vitrification Fertilization Rate , Embryo Quality Development
DOC.criteria: healthy woman age 2137 ( inclusive ) undergo IVF attempt achieve pregnancy Day 24 FSH < 10 IU/ml , LH < 12 IU/ml , E2 < 50 pg/ml Antimullerian Hormone ( AMH ) > 1.5 Between 5 20 basal antral follicle day 24 menstrual cycle BMI > 18 < 32 Smokers Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome ( PCO )
